description:
Before you begin writing, you must discover how you are wired (your personality), your heart (your passions), and your opportunities. This is the first part of a four-part process that will help you reach more people and make money through writing and blogging.

  • Part one: Discovering Your Purpose
  • Part two: Identifying Your Process
  • Part three: Creating Your Products
  • Part four: Establishing Your Platform

In this course, you'll learn from Terry Hadaway, an author and writing coach with more than thirty books to his credit (many as a ghost writer). Terry has worked as an editor-in-chief at a publishing company and successfully self-published some of his own work. In addition, Terry has a PhD in Adult Education with experience teaching adult students in colleges and universities.

This course walks you through a process Dr. Hadaway created while writing his book, Live Your Why. The course includes a multimedia presentation, interactive workbook, summary quizzes, and follow-up assignments.

Each video segment lasts approximately 15-minutes and is coordinated with a fill-in-the-blank workbook. The course should be completed within one week if you invest 30-45 minutes per day in the course content and follow-up assignments.

You should consider taking this course if you've ever considered writing or blogging as a way to expand your business or reach more people. The tips are based on more than 15 years of publishing and educational experience.
title: Entrepreneurial Writing: Discovering Your Purpose
